Description:
In a world of growing data, Microsoft 365 Backup, Archive, and SharePoint Advanced Management support business continuity, reduce storage costs, and improve Copilot relevancy. This session covers content governance and lifecycle management, secure restore, low-cost long-term storage, real-world scenarios like deletion and ransomware, featured Partner solutions, and roadmap insights.
